transformation_logic: if upcase(test_name)='SYSTOLIC BP' then VSTESTCD='SYSBP'; else if upcase(test_name)='DIASTOLIC BP' then VSTESTCD='DIABP'; else if upcase(test_name)='PULSE' then VSTESTCD='PULSE'; else if upcase(test_name)='TEMPERATURE' then VSTESTCD='TEMP'; else if upcase(test_name)='RESPIRATORY RATE' then VSTESTCD='RESP'; else if upcase(test_name)='WEIGHT' then VSTESTCD='WEIGHT'; else if upcase(test_name)='HEIGHT' then VSTESTCD='HEIGHT'; else VSTESTCD=upcase(test_name)

if upcase(test_name)='SYSTOLIC BP' then VSTEST='Systolic Blood Pressure'; else if upcase(test_name)='DIASTOLIC BP' then VSTEST='Diastolic Blood Pressure'; else if upcase(test_name)='PULSE' then VSTEST='Pulse Rate'; else if upcase(test_name)='TEMPERATURE' then VSTEST='Temperature'; else if upcase(test_name)='RESPIRATORY RATE' then VSTEST='Respiratory Rate'; else if upcase(test_name)='WEIGHT' then VSTEST='Weight'; else if upcase(test_name)='HEIGHT' then VSTEST='Height'; else VSTEST=propcase(test_name)
if not missing(vs_date) then VSDTC=put(vs_date,yymmdd10.); if not missing(vs_time) then VSDTC=catx('T',VSDTC,put(vs_time,time8.))
if not missing(vs_date) and not missing(RFSTDTC) then do; if vs_date >= input(RFSTDTC,yymmdd10.) then VSDY=(vs_date - input(RFSTDTC,yymmdd10.)) + 1; else VSDY=vs_date - input(RFSTDTC,yymmdd10.); end
if VSDY < 1 then EPOCH='SCREENING'; else if VSDY >= 1 and VSDY <= 84 then EPOCH='TREATMENT'; else EPOCH='FOLLOW-UP'
if VSTESTCD in ('SYSBP' 'DIABP' 'PULSE') then VSLOC='ARM'; else if VSTESTCD='TEMP' then VSLOC='ORAL'; else VSLOC=''
if missing(result) then VSSTAT='NOT DONE'; else VSSTAT=''
if VSSTAT='NOT DONE' and not missing(reason_nd) then VSREASND=propcase(reason_nd)
